titleStmt.title: God, the guide of youth. Briefly open'd and urg'd in a sermon preached with a special relation to young persons, January 1st. 1694/5 And at the earnest intreaty of several of the hearers published. By T. Cruso.
titleStmt.author: Cruso, Timothy, 1656?-1697.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for T. Cockerill, at the Three Leggs in the Poultrey,

notesStmt.note: With a final leaf of advertisement.
Reproduction of original in Dr. Williams' Library, London, England.

place.placeName: the Three Leggs in the Poultrey
